IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PHILANTHROPIC SOLICITATION, CULTIVATION, AND RECOGNITION ON BEHALF OF SIUE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE SIUE FOUNDATION EXISTS TO SUPPORT THE MISSION, VISION, AND VALUES OF SOUTHERN ILLINOIS UNIVERSITY EDWARDSVILLE. ON BEHALF OF THE UNIVERSITY, THE FOUNDATION PROVIDES FUNDRAISING COORDINATION AND IMPLEMENTATION, SERVES AS THE STEWARD FOR CONTRIBUTIONS, PRODUCES DONOR RECEIPTS, CONDUCTS THE DECENTRALIZED ANNUAL FUND DRIVE PROGRAMS, AND UPHOLDS THE HIGHEST STANDARDS OF FISCAL RESPONSIBILITY AND INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT. THESE EFFORTS ARE CONDUCTED IN RELATION TO THE DONORS' EXPRESSED WISHES AS WELL AS THE INSTRUCTIONAL SCHOLARSHIP, AND PUBLIC SERVICES PURSUITS OF THE UNIVERSITY.
IRS990.Desc: SCHOLARSHIPS AND STUDENT AWARDS: SCHOLARSHIPS AND AWARDS FOR STUDENTS OF SIUE: IN FISCAL YEAR 2018, THE SIUE FOUNDATION PROVIDED $709,198 IN SCHOLARSHIPS AND AWARDS TO 651 OUTSTANDING STUDENTS. THE SIUE FOUNDATION PROVIDES FUNDING FOR SCHOLARSHIPS AND AWARDS FOR DESERVING SIUE STUDENTS IN SUPPORT OF THEIR EFFORTS TO ATTAIN A QUALITY EDUCATION ENABLING THEM TO LAUNCH THEIR PERSONAL VISION AND PROVIDING A SOLID FOUNDATION TO BUILD UPON DURING THEIR LIFETIME. THROUGH SCHOLARSHIP PROCEDURES ESTABLISHED IN EACH COLLEGE, SCHOOL, DEPARTMENT, OR UNIT, STUDENT APPLICANTS ARE EVALUATED USING SPECIFIC CRITERIA FOR THE PARTICULAR SCHOLARSHIP OR AWARD, OFTEN ESTABLISHED BY THE DONOR OF THE FUNDS AWARDED.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: THE SIUE FOUNDATION EXISTS TO SUPPORT THE MISSION, VISION, AND VALUES OF SOUTHERN ILLINOIS UNIVERSITY EDWARDSVILLE. ON BEHALF OF THE UNIVERSITY, THE FOUNDATION PROVIDES FUNDRAISING COORDINATION AND IMPLEMENTATION, SERVES AS THE STEWARD FOR CONTRIBUTIONS, PRODUCES DONOR RECEIPTS, CONDUCTS THE DECENTRALIZED ANNUAL FUND DRIVE PROGRAMS, AND UPHOLDS THE HIGHEST STANDARDS OF FISCAL RESPONSIBILITY AND INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT. THESE EFFORTS ARE CONDUCTED IN RELATION TO THE DONORS' EXPRESSED WISHES AS WELL AS INSTRUCTIONAL SCHOLARSHIP AND PUBLIC SERVICE PURSUITS OF THE UNIVERSITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD HAS ESTABLISHED A POLICY REGARDING SPENDING THE NET INCOME WITH THE STATED PURPOSE OF ENSURING THAT ADMINISTRATORS OF THESE FUNDS ARE ABLE TO MAKE THE BEST POSSIBLE USE OF THE EARNINGS OF THESE FUNDS WHILE PRESERVING THE INTEREST AND INTENT OF THE DONOR, THE FOUNDATION, AND THE UNIVERSITY. THE FOUNDATION'S INVESTMENT POLICY IS ADMINISTERED TO ALL ENDOWMENT FUNDS UNLESS EXCEPTIONS HAVE BEEN STIPULATED BY THE DONOR. THE EARNINGS CAN BE USED FOR THE PURPOSES SPECIFIED BY THE DONOR INCLUDING SCHOLARSHIPS, AWARDS, OR SUPPORT FOR A PARTICULAR SCHOOL OR DEPARTMENT. LESS THAN TWO PERCENT OF THE ENDOWMENT IS UNRESTRICTED.

THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE (IRS) HAS ISSUED A DETERMINATION LETTER, DATED AUGUST 19, 1982, INDICATING THAT THE FOUNDATION QUALIFIES FOR FEDERAL INCOME TAX EXEMPTION UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE EXCEPT FOR INCOME TAXES ASSOCIATED WITH UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME. THE IRS HAS FURTHER DETERMINED THAT THE FOUNDATION IS NOT A PRIVATE FOUNDATION.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: REIMBURSEMENT FOR EXPENSES IN SUPPORT OF INDIVIDUAL RECOGNITION, RESEARCH, AND CREATIVE ACTIVITY PROJECTS SUCH AS : ENTERPRISE HOLDINGS OUTSTANDING STUDENT ORGANIZATION, FRIENDS OF LOVEJOY LIBRARY, ILLINOIS JUNIOR ACADEMY OF SCIENCE, METRO EAST START-UP CHALLENGE, SIUE ANNUAL HIGH SCHOOL ART EXHIBITION, MERIDIAN SOCIETY AWARDS, EMERITI FACULTY ASSOCIATION AWARDS, AND VARIOUS OTHER STIPEND AWARDS.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: ALUMNI ASSOCIATION OF SOURTHERN ILLINOIS UNIVERSITY EDWARDSVILLE

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: REIMBURSEMENT FOR EXPENSES IN SUPPORT OF INDIVIDUAL RECOGNITION, RESEARCH, AND CREATIVE ACTIVITY PROJECTS SUCH AS : ENTERPRISE HOLDINGS OUTSTANDING STUDENT ORGANIZATION, FRIENDS OF LOVEJOY LIBRARY, ILLINOIS JUNIOR ACADEMY OF SCIENCE, METRO EAST START-UP CHALLENGE, SIUE ANNUAL HIGH SCHOOL ART EXHIBITION, MERIDIAN SOCIETY AWARDS, EMERITI FACULTY ASSOCIATION AWARDS, AND VARIOUS OTHER STIPEND AWARDS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SIUE FOUNDATION OFFICE OF FINANCIAL AFFAIRS IS RESPONSIBLE FOR ENSURING FUNDS ARE UTILIZED IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE STIPULATIONS OF THE DONOR. MULTIPLE CHECKS AND BALANCES ARE IN PLACE TO MAXIMIZE CONTROLS OVER THE PROCESS INCLUDING REQUIREMENTS TO TWO APPROVALS FOR DISBURSEMENTS FROM THE ORIGINATING SCHOOL OR COLLEGE, SEGREGATION OF THE DISBURSEMENT PROCESSING STEPS IN FINANCIAL AFFAIRS AND DONOR REPORTING. DEPARTMENTAL REPORTING ALSO AIDS IN IDENTIFYING AND RESOLVING ANY VARIANCES TO STATED PROCEDURES REGARDING THE GRANTS/ASSISTANCE PAYMENTS.

THE HUMAN RESOURCES DEPARTMENT OF SOUTHERN ILLINOIS UNIVERISTY EDWARDSVILLE, A RELATED ORGANIZATION, MAINTAINS EXTENSIVE SALARY DATA AND SINCE EMPLOYEES ARE PAID BY THE UNIVERSITY AND NOT BY THE FILING ORGANIZATION, THE UNIVERSITY ASSISTS IN THE PROCESS OF DETERMINING AN APPROPRIATE SALARY BASED ON REVIEW OF COMPARABLE POSITIONS AND BUDGETARY CONSIDERATIONS.
AN AUCTION HOUSE IS SOMETIMES USED TO SELL ARTWORK AND OTHER COLLECTIBLES AND ARE PAID A FLAT COMMISSION PERCENTAGE FROM THE PROCEEDS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS WAS EMAILED A COPY OF THE PREPARED FORM 990 BEFORE IT WAS FILED. THE AUDIT COMMITTEE REVIEWED THE 990. THE FILING IS REVIEWED IN DETAIL TO ENSURE THE COMMITTEE IS COMFORTABLE WITH THE PROCESS USED BY MANAGEMENT TO COMPLETE THE FORM.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS INCLUDING ITS OFFICERS AND CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER OF THE ORGANIZATION ARE REQUIRED TO ANNUALLY COMPLETE THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST QUESTIONNAIRE AND SUBMIT IT TO THE FOUNDATION. REMINDERS ARE THEN SENT TO THOSE WHO DO NOT COMPLY WITH THE ORIGINAL DUE DATE. THERE IS CURRENTLY NO PENALTY FOR NOT COMPLYING WITH THE POLICY, THOUGH REMINDERS CONTINUE TO BE SENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES HAVE BEEN TRADITIONALLY HIRED WITH THE APPOINTMENT OF A COMMITTEE. ONE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE COMMITTEE IS TO EVALUATE A SALARY RANGE. THE HUMAN RESOURCES DEPARTMENT OF SOUTHERN ILLINOIS UNIVERSITY EDWARDSVILLE MAINTAINS EXTENSIVE SALARY DATA AND SINCE EMPLOYEES ARE PAID BY THE UNIVERSITY AND NOT BY THE FILING OF THE ORGANIZATION, THE UNIVERSITY ASSISTS IN THE PROCESS OF DETERMINING AN APPROPRIATE SALARY TO OFFICERS BASED ON REVIEW OF COMPARABLE POSITIONS AND BUDGETARY CONSIDERATIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST INCLUDE THE AUDIT REPORT, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND THE GOVERNING DOCUMENT.
